title: 3dLSS
description: Least-Squares-Sum (LSS) estimation tool from a -stim_times_IM matrix for multivoxel pattern classification analyses.

matrix.title: Matrix File
matrix.description: Read the matrix 'mmm', which should have been output from 3dDeconvolve via the '-x1D' option. It should have included exactly one '-stim_times_IM' option.

nodata.title: No Data Flag
nodata.description: Just compute the estimator matrix -- to be saved with '-save1D'.

mask.title: Mask File
mask.description: Dataset 'MMM' will be used as a mask for the input; voxels outside the mask will not be fit by the regression model.

automask.title: Automask
automask.description: If you don't know what this does by now, please don't use this program.

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix name for the output dataset; this dataset will contain ONLY the LSS estimates of the beta weights for the '-stim_times_IM' stimuli.

save1D.title: Save Estimators File
save1D.description: Save the estimator vectors to a 1D formatted file named 'qqq'.
